creator: Theo turnt GmbH
descriptionHtml:
With Theo turnt, parents get a digital platform with creative movement and play ideas for their children aged 1-6. Together, these are realized with materials from nature or the home. By comparing movement competences with children of the same age, parents can preventively identify developmental deficits.

We have provided you with games for fine and gross motor skills in the app. Together with your child you can spend an active afternoon. The instructions will help you to complete the game step by step.

Using a development matrix appropriate to each game, you can discover what motor skills your child should have at the appropriate age.

With its play ideas, Theo turnt has the goal of providing your child with a variety of movement experiences. Using tools from nature and the home, these can be implemented by anyone and lead to (re)discovering the interest and fun of movement and at the same time to train the motor development.

The short and precise instructions make it possible to quickly grasp the game and then experience many great, exciting and creative experiences in the family without the use of the smartphone.

What you get with Theo turnt:

• a concept developed by educational scientists
• content developed by sports scientists and childhood pedagogues, which is optimally adapted to the age of your child
• creative & resource-oriented play and movement ideas
• playful learning of basic forms of movement
• creating a solid basis for later in-depth, sport-specific training
• preventive measure to later lack of fitness,
obesity, posture problems, cardiovascular problems, etc.
• flexible, location-independent & cost-effective to use

Sounds exciting? Then ready, steady, go!

If you have any problems or suggestions for improvement, please contact us via email kontakt@theoturnt.de or via Instagram / Facebook (theoturnt). We are looking forward to your feedback.

We are looking forward to seeing you!
Your team from Theo turnt.
descriptionShort: Creative Movement & Play Ideas for Parents of Children aged 1-6 Years

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We have integrated tags into the app. In the search you will now find all available tags, which lead you specifically to the associated games. The associated tags are also displayed in the game details. This makes it even easier to find similar games. In addition, we have significantly improved the performance in some parts of the app. Have fun with the new version. We are looking forward to your feedback. :-)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We have better optimized the app for use on tablets. We also fixed a few small bugs. Have you already explored the new videos and interactive elements? No? Then you should definitely take a look at the new version. We hope you like the app and look forward to your feedback.

Have you already explored the new videos and interactive elements? No? Then you should definitely take a look at the new version. We hope you like the app and look forward to your feedback.
